events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because this is not what I purchased.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle this refund request and begin communication.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you need a refund for the wrong item received. I am here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456789, and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item I received instead of the shoes I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund within 5 business days and you do not need to return the incorrect item.
Thank you for your quick response and for not requiring me to send the wrong item back. That really helps.
Your refund has been successfully initiated, and you should see the amount back in your account within a few days.
Checking in to confirm that you have received your refund as promised and if there is anything else we can help you with.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday. Everything looks good now. Thanks for your excellent support.
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing this case now. Have a great day!
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience with our support.
